notices.title: Examination Schedule
notices.content: The final examination schedule for the current semester is now available. Please check the college website for more details.

notices.title: Library Closure
notices.content: Due to maintenance work, the college library will remain closed on June 17th. Apologies for the inconvenience caused.

notices.title: Guest Lecture on Artificial Intelligence
notices.content: A guest lecture on Artificial Intelligence will be held on June 20th at the college auditorium. All interested students are requested to attend.

notices.title: Sports Day Announcement
notices.content: The annual Sports Day will take place on June 25th. Students can participate in various sports events. Register at the college sports office.

notices.title: Internship Opportunities
notices.content: Several companies are offering summer internships for college students. Visit the career services office for more information and to apply.
